title: About Me!
text: Hi, I’m Sose and I’m a senior at the University of Pennsylvania, majoring in Communication with a concentration in data and network science. I also have minors in consumer psychology and history and plan on a career in corporate communications and marketing. I’m excited to show off what I’ve learned in my COMM data and network science classes thus far in the blog posts below!

title: A test post
text:
Stories from data

Let’s set up some data


x = ['A', 'B', 'C']
y = [1, 5, 3]


Now let’s visualize it

plt.bar(x, y)
plt.show()

title: My first post
text:
Hey everyone - Sose here! Welcome to my blog! Here I will be documenting a number of stories told by data. I am super interested in journalism and this is my first time engaging with data-driven storytelling. Buckle up for the ride ahead!


Numbers are everywhere. We may not immediately see a story when we see endless lists or charts of numbers, but they always tell a story! Throughout this semester, we will work together to learn how to extract impactful, important stories out of seemingly meaningless datasets.
